description.value: You can disguise yourself with magical illusions. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Illusory Disguise]{Illusory Disguise} once per day as a 1st-level primal innate spell. At 7th level, the spell is heightened to 2nd level, and every 2 levels thereafter, the spell is heightened an additional spell level.
